front.title: IPsec Security Policy IKE Action MIB

abstract.t: This document defines a SMIv2 Management Information Base (MIB) module for configuring IKE actions for the security policy database (SPD) of a device that uses the IPsec Security Policy Database Configuration MIB for configuring the IKE protocol actions on that device. The IPSP IKE Action MIB integrates directly with the IPsec Security Policy Database Configuration MIB and it is meant to work within the framework of an action referenced by that MIB.
